bibl.title: P. Coll. Youtie 38: Receipt for Arithmetikon Katoikon and Naubion Katoikon.
bibl.note: P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 39855 = P. Coll. Youtie I, 38, a tax receipt from Herakleia, 128 A.D., can be partially restored by comparison with a similar receipt from the same village, B.G.U. XV, 2525, 83-85 A.D. With translation.
Nelson Carroll A., P. Coll. Youtie 38: Receipt for Arithmetikon Katoikon and Naubion Katoikon.
